title: Spirit Guard Udyr Bug
body: If Udyr is killed within a short time after activating pheonix stance (or executed) from when he respawns and the rest of the game any activated stance will make the pheonix sound, quite annoying after a while

replies.body:
Thanks for the report! 

This is a known issue and we're working on a fix!
I'm not sure if you guy's are aware but there's a Sion Bug when he Ult's he is able to stop/manipulate his ult movement by pressing H (may be other button's not sure on that)
